string.name: application_exception_crash_event
string.value: Click to build application crash event

string.name: application_exception_freeze_event
string.value: Click to build application stuck event

string.name: application_exception_application_fault_description_harmonyos
string.value: Click to build an abnormal event. the system abnormal event will be triggered. You need to restart the application and enter this page to obtain the reason for the last abnormal exit

string.name: application_exception_application_fault_description_arkuix
string.value: Click to build an exception event, Due to specifications and actual machine performance reasons, it will take about 1 minute to obtain the exception data

string.name: application_exception_data_delay_toast
string.value: 数据大约在1-3min会进行更新
